title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupts the layout in Build 2002071610021.
OB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row is deleted. As a result, the entire second row is removed.
EB: When pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted, but the second row should remain intact.
SR: 1. Open the Coolbar. 2. Press the Delete button. 3. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the second row remains intact.
